#include <mCtrl/mditab.h>

Detailed Description

Structure for manipulating with tab item (unicode version).
See also:
mc_MT_INSERTITEM mc_MT_DELETEITEM mc_MT_SETITEM mc_MT_GETITEM

Field Documentation

DWORD mc_MT_ITEMW::dwMask

Mask specifying which other members are valid.

On input, set this member to mark which members of the stucture are valid. use any combination of MC_MTIF_TEXT, MC_MTIF_IMAGE and MC_MTIF_PARAM.
